Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrd-hush] <Privatoshi> In order to do this & do it right, I'd propose targeting two sets of users.  

The first set of users will be somewhat interested, but slightly more interested in prizes, in the beginning. And I think that includes more frequent lottery, infographic contest I saw in marketing & a Hush Puzzle... The last two are more likely to create interest in the user, over the span of the activiy. And, draw in new users by showing off these drawings, for example to Twitter, Reddit, etc...

The second set of usetrs are more interested in privacy. For this, I'd recommend to be more vocal about Tails w/Silent Dragon. Or, if someone was so ambitious, to create a HUSH Linux OS.

I think the best time to initiate interest is now. And it doesn't matter why that is now, it just matters that we shift people's attention to what matters.
